snippet: The money will go to the United Nations for use in helping the estimated one million Iraqis whose lives have been upended by the Sunni insurgency.
abstract: Saudi Arabia donates $500 million to the United Nations to help estimated one million Iraqis who have been displaced by the Sunni insurgency.

byline.contributor: Rod Nordland contributed reporting from Baghdad, and Michael R. Gordon from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The money will go to the United Nations for use in helping the estimated one million Iraqis whose lives have been upended by the Sunni insurgency.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia Donates $500 Million to Help Displaced Iraqis
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia Donates $500 Million to Help Displaced Iraqis

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
